Attribute.Name: Carrier
Attribute.Description: The carrier used for return service.

Attribute.Name: ConsigneeAddress1
Attribute.Description: The address line 1 of the Consignee/Buyer of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ConsigneeAddress2
Attribute.Description: The address line 2 of the Consignee/Buyer of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ConsigneeAddress3
Attribute.Description: The address line 3 of the Consignee/Buyer of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ConsigneeAttention
Attribute.Description: The Contact name of the Consignee/Buyer of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ConsigneeCity
Attribute.Description: The city of the Consignee/Buyer of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ConsigneeCompanyName
Attribute.Description: The Company name of the Consignee/Buyer of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ConsigneeCountry
Attribute.Description: The country of the Consignee/Buyer of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ConsigneeEmailAddress
Attribute.Description: The email address of the Consignee/Buyer of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ConsigneePhone
Attribute.Description: The phone number of the Consignee/Buyer of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ConsigneePostalCode
Attribute.Description: The zip code of the Consignee/Buyer of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ConsigneeStateProv
Attribute.Description: The state of the Consignee/Buyer of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ConsigneeUPSAcctNumber
Attribute.Description: The Account number of the Consignee/Buyer of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: DescriptionOfGoods
Attribute.Description: If return label is for a particular SKU, then this attribute points to Item's description, else the value of this attribute will be blank or hard coded to Package.

Attribute.Name: EmailLabelExpDate
Attribute.Description: The expiration date of emailed label. This attribute is used for Sterling Fedex Adaptor.

Attribute.Name: LabelFormatValue
Attribute.Description: The kind of printer to be used for printing return label.

Attribute.Name: PackageActualWeight
Attribute.Description: If return label is for a particular SKU, then this attribute points to Item's weight, else the weight of the package.

Attribute.Name: PackageHeight
Attribute.Description: If return label is for a particular SKU, then this attribute points to Item's height, else the height of the package.

Attribute.Name: PackageLength
Attribute.Description: If return label is for a particular SKU, then this attribute points to Item's length, else the length of the package.

Attribute.Name: PackageWidth
Attribute.Description: If return label is for a particular SKU, then this attribute points to Item's width, else the width of the package.

Attribute.Name: PartNumber
Attribute.Description: If return label is for a particular SKU, then this attribute points to Item's item id, else the value of this attribute will be blank or hard coded to Package.

Attribute.Name: ReturnShipIndicator
Attribute.Description: Indicator that this is return shipment. This attribute is used only for Sterling Fedex Adaptor.

Attribute.Name: ShipID
Attribute.Description: The container nunber of the container having this return label.

Attribute.Name: ShipmentChgType
Attribute.Description: The return freight terms of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ShipmentKey
Attribute.Description: The primary key of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ShipperAccountNumber
Attribute.Description: The Shipper Account number of the Shipper of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ShipperAddress1
Attribute.Description: The address line 1 of the Shipper of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ShipperAddress2
Attribute.Description: The address line 2 of the Shipper of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ShipperAddress3
Attribute.Description: The address line 3 of the Shipper of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ShipperCity
Attribute.Description: The city of the Shipper of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ShipperCompanyName
Attribute.Description: The Company name of the Shipper of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ShipperContactName
Attribute.Description: The Contact name of the Shipper of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ShipperCountry
Attribute.Description: The country of the Shipper of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ShipperEmailAddress
Attribute.Description: The email address of the Shipper of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ShipperPhoneNumber
Attribute.Description: The phone number of the Shipper of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ShipperState
Attribute.Description: The state of the Shipper of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ShipperZipCode
Attribute.Description: The zip code of the Shipper of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ThermalLabelPrinterID
Attribute.Description: The printer on which the return label is required to be printed.

Attribute.Name: UOMDim
Attribute.Description: Unit of measure of dimensions (defined on locale).

Attribute.Name: UOMWeight
Attribute.Description: Weight Unit of measure (defined on locale).

Attribute.Name: UPSServiceType
Attribute.Description: The carrier service used for return service.

Element.Description: The connection parameters used to connect to the Carrier Server.

Attribute.Name: SellerOrganizationCode
Attribute.Description: The seller organization code of the shipment.

Attribute.Name: ShipNode
Attribute.Description: The Ship Node of the shipment.

Element.Description: The connection parameters used to connect to the FSMS server.

Attribute.Name: FedExIPAddress
Attribute.Description: The IP address of the machine on which FSMS is installed.

Attribute.Name: FedExPortNo
Attribute.Description: The Port No of the machine on which FSMS is installed.

Element.Description: The connection parameters used to connect to the ConnectShip server.

Attribute.Name: ConnectShipURL
Attribute.Description: The URL to connect to ConnectShip server.

Element.Description: The connection parameters used to connect to the Pierbridge Shipment server.

Attribute.Name: PBDBPassword
Attribute.Description: The password to connect to Pierbridge Shipment server's database.

Attribute.Name: PBDBURL
Attribute.Description: The jdbc URL of Pierbridge Shipment server's database.

Attribute.Name: PBDBUserName
Attribute.Description: The user name to connect to Pierbridge Shipment server's database.

Attribute.Name: PBDefaultRateRequestUser
Attribute.Description: The user name used to get freight charges from Pierbridge Shipment Server.

Attribute.Name: PBServerURL
Attribute.Description: The URL to connect to Pierbridge Shipment server.
